title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management and payment processing.
overview: Built a comprehensive e-commerce solution from scratch, featuring user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and secure payment processing. The platform supports multiple payment methods and provides real-time inventory updates.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering

details.heading: Technical Architecture
details.paragraph: The platform is built using a microservices architecture, with separate services for authentication, product management, order processing, and payment handling. This ensures scalability and maintainability.

details.heading: Key Challenges
details.paragraph: One of the main challenges was implementing real-time inventory synchronization across multiple instances. We solved this using Redis pub/sub and WebSocket connections.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.
overview: Developed a modern task management solution that enables teams to collaborate effectively. Features include task assignment, progress tracking, real-time updates, and integrated communication.
features: Create and assign tasks to team members

details.heading: Real-time Synchronization
details.paragraph: Leveraged Firebase Realtime Database for instant synchronization across all connected clients, ensuring team members always see the latest updates.

details.heading: User Experience
details.paragraph: Focused on creating an intuitive drag-and-drop interface with smooth animations and responsive feedback for all user actions.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A beautiful weather application with detailed forecasts, radar maps, and severe weather alerts.
overview: Created a cross-platform mobile weather application providing accurate forecasts, interactive radar maps, and timely severe weather alerts. The app features a clean, modern UI with smooth animations.

details.heading: API Integration
details.paragraph: Integrated with OpenWeather API for comprehensive weather data, including current conditions, forecasts, and historical data.

details.heading: Performance Optimization
details.paragraph: Implemented efficient caching strategies and data compression to minimize API calls and ensure fast load times even on slower connections.

title: Portfolio Website Builder
description: A drag-and-drop website builder specifically designed for creating professional portfolio websites.
overview: Building an intuitive website builder that allows designers, developers, and creative professionals to create stunning portfolio websites without writing code. Features pre-built templates and customizable components.

details.heading: Component System
details.paragraph: Developed a flexible component system that allows users to customize every aspect of their website while maintaining design consistency.

details.heading: Performance
details.paragraph: Implemented lazy loading, image optimization, and code splitting to ensure generated websites load quickly and perform well.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking application with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress analytics.
overview: Developed a cross-platform fitness application that helps users track their workouts, monitor nutrition, and achieve their fitness goals. Integrates with popular health platforms for comprehensive data tracking.

details.heading: Health Platform Integration
details.paragraph: Integrated with Apple HealthKit and Google Fit to automatically sync workout data and provide a holistic view of user health.

details.heading: Gamification
details.paragraph: Implemented achievement badges, streaks, and social challenges to keep users motivated and engaged with their fitness journey.
